testsuite.name: I as a user require to make a reservation from the Stays tab.

testcase.name: Validate that you can select a room if the accommodation is available.
validate that the user can not continue, if he does not fill in the fields
validate that the user can not continue, if he just fill the name field
validate that the user can not continue, if he just fill the lastname field
validate that the user can not continue, if he not fill the email field
validate that the user can not continue, if he fill the email field with a incorrect domain
validate that the user can continue, if he fill the fields correctly
validate that the user can not continue, if he dont fill the mobile number field
validate that the user can not enter alphanumeric values into mobile number field
validate that the user can enter the number into mobile number field
validate that the user can not enter alphanumeric values into number card field
validate that the user can select the card SCOTIBANK
validate that the user can not continue, if he select the bottom completa la reserva with empty fields in the payment section
validate that the user can not type more than 3 characters into CVC code
